thread.title_full: ‘When the Street Lights Go On’ Review: Eery ’80s Murder-Mystery Blends ‘Stranger Things’ with ‘The Night Of’ — Sundance 2017

author: Ben Travers
title: ‘When the Street Lights Go On’ Review: Eery ’80s Murder-Mystery Blends ‘Stranger Things’ with ‘The Night Of’ — Sundance 2017
text: "The Kid Stays in the Picture" director Brett Morgen helps transform a Black List feature script into a TV show alive with '80s nostalgia.
